message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I think the price is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
